resources.string: This Fragment is going to call Moto Details through an ID. This will pass a Moto Parcelized Model using NavArgs Plugin.\n\n Like we are passing the model, in the Moto Details fragment we can retrieve the Model in the arguments.
This Fragment is going to call Moto Details using Deeplink, and pass the Moto ID 32.\n\nAfter you can call an API and pass the ID to retrieve data for the Moto ID 32.
This Fragment is going to call a Fragment Dialog.\n\nMeaning this Fragment will show over the current Fragment Loaded.
This Fragment is going to call a Car Details through an Action ID.\n\nThis will pass a Car Parcelized Model using NavArgs Plugin.
